title: Monica McCarty - Highland Guard series #1-7
description:
Chosen to help Robert the Bruce in his quest to free Scotland from English rule and claim his crown, the legendary team of warriors known as the Highland Guard battles on.

The Chief (Highland Guard, #1)
Scouring the darkest corners of the Highlands and Western Isles, Robert the Bruce handpicks ten warriors to help him in his quest to free Scotland from English rule. They are the best of the best, chosen for their superior skills in each discipline of warfare. And to lead his secret Highland Guard, Bruce chooses the greatest warrior of all.

The ultimate Highland warlord and a swordsman without equal, Tor MacLeod has no intention of being drawn into ScotlandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s war against the English. Dedicated to his clan, the fiercely independent chief answers to no oneÃ¢â‚¬â€especially not to his alluring new bride, bartered to him in a bid to secure his command of the deadliest fighting force the world has ever seen. The treacherous chit who made her way to TorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bed may have won his hand, but she will never claim his heart.

Although her husbandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s reputation is as fierce as his manner, Christina Fraser believes that something softer hides beneath his brutal shell. But the only warmth she feels is in their bed, in glorious moments of white-hot desire that disappear with the dawn. When ChristinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s reckless bid to win her husbandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s love goes awry and thrusts them into danger on the eve of war, Tor will face his ultimate battle: to save his wife and to open his heartÃ¢â‚¬â€before itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s too late.

The Hawk (Highland Guard, #2)
Erik MacSorley is a brilliant seafarer who has never encountered a wind he could not harness or a woman he could not winÃ¢â‚¬â€until he drags a wet, half-naked Ã¢â‚¬Å“nursemaidÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ out of the waters off the Irish coast. EllieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ordinary appearance belies the truth: She is in fact Lady Elyne de Burgh, the spirited daughter of the most powerful noble in Ireland. Worse, this irresistible woman is determined to prove herself immune to ErikÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s charmsÃ¢â‚¬â€a challenge he cannot resist.

Her captor may look every inch a rugged warrior, but Ellie vows that it will take more than a wickedly suggestive caress to impress her. Yet Erik will sweep away EllieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s resistance with a desire that resonates deep within her heart. Still, he is a man driven by loyalty, and she is a woman with secrets that could jeopardize BruceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s chance to reclaim his throne. As the battle for king and country sounds across the shores, will EllieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s love be enough to finally tame the legend known as the Hawk?

The Ranger (Highland Guard, #3)
Embedded deep behind enemy lines, Arthur Ã¢â‚¬Å“RangerÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Campbell is prized for his razor-sharp senses and his ability to blend into the shadows. But when Arthur infiltrates the clan of the chieftain who murdered his father, his heart is locked on revenge. Inside he faces unexpected resistance from the sweetest of obstaclesÃ¢â‚¬â€a honey-haired siren who is his enemyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s daughter.

Intrigued by this ruggedly handsome newcomer to her fatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s forces, the vivacious, enchanting Anna MacDougall is a woman whose skill at uncovering deception rivals ArthurÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s own. Though yearning for a quiet life with a good man to love, Anna is drawn to this mysterious knight whose eyes devour her but whose words push her away. As danger, treachery, and the threat of looming war draw them closer into each otherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s arms, a warrior made of steel must make a choice from the heart: love or revenge.

The Viper (Highland Guard, #4)
Prized for his snakelike stealth and deadly strikes, Lachlan Ã¢â‚¬Å“ViperÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ MacRuairi is a warrior to enlist but not to trust. His only loyalty is to his purse, his indifference sealed by bitter betrayal. All that changes when Lachlan is tasked to protect and deliver Bella MacDuff to the kingÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s coronationÃ¢â‚¬â€and the proud, lushly sensual countess unwittingly challenges him to his greatest battle yet: to love again.

Passionate and devoted, Bella has defied BritainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s king and her own husband to place the crown on BruceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s head, and for this she pays a terrible price: Losing her daughter and her freedom to her husbandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s vengeance. Imprisoned with barbaric cruelty, she vows to reclaim her child, even if it means selling her soulÃ¢â‚¬â€and her bodyÃ¢â‚¬â€to a dark, lethal warrior whose eyes glint like steel, but who makes her skin tingle and her breath race. Together they embark on a rogue mission with sinister twists and turns that threatens not only BellaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s gamble to save her daughterÃ¢â‚¬â€but also her heart.

The Saint (Highland Guard, #5)
Magnus MacKay is the ultimate Highlander: tough, proud, able to master any terrain and to best his enemies. Called Ã¢â‚¬Å“the SaintÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ for his refusal to discuss women, as well as for his cool and steady leadership, Magnus hides a painful truth. It isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t virtue or piety that keeps him silent, but a wound of love and loss that cuts so deep he cannot bear to speak of it. But when the woman who refused him is betrothed to his friend and fellow Guardsman, Magnus is tested by loveÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s battle cry.
 
A wild and innocent beauty, Helen chose family duty over her desire for Magnus. Now the anger in his eyes mirrors the tormented regret in her heart. But as deadly subterfuge stalks the King and his Guard, Helen vows to right her youthful mistakes with a womanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s determined spirit. Still, Magnus harbors secrets and an iron will not to weaken to temptationÃ¢â‚¬â€or heartacheÃ¢â‚¬â€again. But as danger looms, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the kiss not of a saint, but of a sinner, that can save them.

The Recruit (Highland Guard, #6)
Fiery, aggressive, and bold, Kenneth Sutherland is a true championÃ¢â‚¬â€skilled with any weapon and driven to win. Now Kenneth is ready for his greatest challenge: joining Robert the BruceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s secret army to fight among the elite. KennethÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best chance to attain that honor is by winning the Highland Games. Focused and prepared for victory, he is caught off guard by a lovely wisp of a womanÃ¢â‚¬â€and a stolen moment of wicked seduction. Her innocent arousal and her shameless hunger fire his blood. He will win his place in the guardÃ¢â‚¬â€and in Mary of MarÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bed.
  
The ruggedly handsome hero-in-the-making stirs a heart that should know better. Mary vows that her surrender will be sport onlyÃ¢â‚¬â€no promises, no heartbreak, just one night of incredible passion. Nothing, she swears, will persuade her to give up her hard-wrought independence and put her fate in the hands of another powerful man. But with every gentle touch and heart-pounding kiss, Kenneth makes her want more. Now Mary wants his heart. But is this determined champion willing to surrender everything for love?

The Hunter (Highland Guard, #7)
Prized for his unbeatable tracking skills, Ewen Ã¢â‚¬Å“HunterÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Lamont accepts a dangerous assignment: locate a missing undercover courier. But this is no ordinary target. Ewen has met his prey before as Ã¢â‚¬Å“Sister Genna,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ a fiery, forbidden woman forever etched in his memory after one stolen, sinful kiss. Now that he knows her real identity, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s more determined than ever to keep her safe. But without the protection of the veil between them, fighting the allure of the beautiful lass may be the toughest battle this extraordinary warrior has ever faced.

After her ill-fated attempt three years ago to rescue her twin sister, Janet of Mar has found salvation acting as a royal messengerÃ¢â‚¬â€until she surrenders to a darkly handsome warrior whose rough, sensual kisses stir feelings the woman in her canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t deny. But when betrayal leads to danger, and a crucial communiquÃƒÂ© is put in jeopardy, Janet has no choice but to put her faith in the hunter who can find anythingÃ¢â‚¬â€perhaps even her heart.

Epub Only
